comments_since_last_sample.body: I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.
I would like to be entered into the giveaway. I definitely rocked ADG. Was also signature scent.

Hey Ash, huge fan, first time hoping to get into a giveaway, can't believe I missed this video, and hope I am not too late. I took my turn with ADG as my only sent as a teenager in the late 1990s-early 2000s. I'm pretty new to collecting and have been thinking about getting my nostalgia fragrances from those times including ADG, Polo Sport, Curve, and the original Hugo Boss canteen bottle, but you give me too many other suggestions that I buy instead! I would love to win this for the nostalgia.
Today is my birthday! Would love to have an OG ADG as a gift for me haha thanks Ash!
